attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: next time we are advised of imminent heavy rainfall in south yorkshire the south yorkshire navigation will be emptied to stop flooding.this would save approx 80%of water damage in sheffield,rotherham,doncaster etc.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
